channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Planet Money Summer School tackles political economy

item.title: First Indian astronaut to visit ISS returns to Earth
item.description: The Axiom-4 (Ax-4) mission with Shubhanshu Shukla splashed down off the coast of California.

item.title: Ex-Nigerian President Buhari to be buried at home
item.description: Muhammadu Buhari, who was both a military ruler and elected president, died in London on Sunday.

item.title: Aid workers 'executed' in Ethiopia's Tigray war, charity says
item.description: A Spaniard and two Ethiopians were shot dead during the conflict in northern Ethiopia, MSF says.

item.title: Trump attending major energy and AI summit in Pittsburgh Tuesday
item.description: A number of political leaders and big names from the tech and AI industries are expected to be there.

item.title: Photos show major flooding from New York City-area storms
item.description: Severe storms prompted flash flood warnings across the New York City area on Monday night.

item.title: A Florida county leads the way with a high-tech 911 system that improves emergency response
item.description: Collier County, Florida, uses one of the most advanced 911 systems in the U.S., allowing callers to send texts and videos.

item.title: 'Not our war' - Trump's Nato weapons deal for Ukraine sparks MAGA anger
item.description: Marjorie Taylor Greene, a key Trump ally, and former Trump strategist Steve Bannon have criticised the move.
